data.title: Glasgow Airport
data.meta_description: Select from one of our bars or lounges at Glasgow Airport. Why not start your trip off in style with a visit to the UpperDeck Lounge.
data.text:
The Lomond Lounge is open daily to guests. Read more to find out full lounge opening times.

Enjoy the very best of Glasgow before your flight with the Lomond Lounge’s premium Loch Lomond Group Whiskies, Gins, Champagne and sprits.

The maximum stay in the Lounge is up to 3 hours from your arrival time.

Guests can enjoy a selection of dishes including a variety of lighter bites, seasonal meat/cheese/vegan platters and newly added hot options.

Guests can enjoy up to 4 alcoholic drinks in total within the Lomond Lounge package. Soft drinks and refreshments are unlimited.

Pricing:

Entry: From £35

Read More

Book Now

The UpperDeck Lounge is open daily from 05:00 - 20:30 with last bookings taken at 18:30.

The maximum stay in the Lounge is up to 3 hours from your arrival time.

This fresh, modern, and relaxing lounge has something for everyone. Perfect for business or leisure – take the time to sit back before your journey with stunning views of the runway. Watch planes take off whilst taking advantage of the free Wi-Fi and complimentary drinks and snacks (alcoholic drinks are limited to four per person).

Customers can use the lounge for up to three hours prior to your departure flight. The UpperDeck lounge is located after security and is only accessible with a valid boarding card.

Pricing:

Adult (18+): From £32

Children (4-17) : £21

Infants (0-3) : Free

Book UpperDeck Lounge

Read More
